channel.title: How do I add/edit what items are in the shops & what npc's are in certain towns
channel.description: Hi, I just started my server and how it is right now is the prayer doesnt work, i want to get rid of steel dragons in varrock and the barrows brothers lol,(and editing what they say) when someone goes to logout i want it to be saying Please use this button to logout safely and so basically everything. How do I go about doing this? HELP! :confused:

item.title: How do I add/edit what items are in the shops & what npc's are in certain towns
item.dc:creator: @cowie cowie
item.description:
@cowie wrote:

for changing ur log out button search end of easter drop in client.java and edit tht
to edit where npc’s are open ur autospawn and changes co-ords in there to edit shops go into shops.cfg and edit the item id’s ftw?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add/edit what items are in the shops & what npc's are in certain towns
